docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 8 (U.P.) -- Judge Julio C. de Gregorio, Uruguayan Government investigator, alleged tonight that oil had been smuggled through Southern Brazil to German warships in the Atlantic and that a map showing plans for German...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 8 (U.P.) -- Judge Julio C. de Gregorio, Uruguayan Government investigator, alleged tonight that oil had been smuggled through Southern Brazil to German warships in the Atlantic and that a map showing plans for German conquest of South American territory had been confiscated in the same area.
docs.abstract: Uruguayan Judge J C de Gregorio repts oil smuggled through Brazil to German warships and discovery of map showing plans for German conquest of South Amer area

docs.snippet: With the permission of the British postal authorities the Czech Army forces stationed "somewhere in England" have been permitted to set up their own "Ceskoslovenska Polni Posta" (Czechoslovakia Field Post) and to place cachets on mail handled there.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 15 -- Foreign Minister Alberto Guani of Uruguay formally inaugurated this evening the Emergency Advisory Committee for Political Defense, established in accordance with a resolution of the Rio de Janeiro conference to...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, April 15 -- Foreign Minister Alberto Guani of Uruguay formally inaugurated this evening the Emergency Advisory Committee for Political Defense, established in accordance with a resolution of the Rio de Janeiro conference to coordinate and promote measures by all American republics to curb foreign activities likely to endanger their security.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, April 18 -- The Spanish ship Cabo de Buena Esperanza, with 3,000 tons of fuel oil, has been here four days trying to get 700 more tons so as to be able to make the round trip to Cadiz, Spain, it was learned today.
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, April 18 -- The Spanish ship Cabo de Buena Esperanza, with 3,000 tons of fuel oil, has been here four days trying to get 700 more tons so as to be able to make the round trip to Cadiz, Spain, it was learned today.
docs.abstract: Cabo de Buena Esperanza, carrying envoys from Uruguay, held in Rio de Janeiro by oil shortage
